valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 11 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 12 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Developing Atlantic low moving steadily northeastwards, expected Faeroes 962 by midday tomorrow

Rain.
